website_summaries.verdict: Basic yet durable clippers that share features with costlier models. A sound choice if you want quality and value.
pros: This pro-grade feature set includes steel blades in your choice of two sizes
They are inexpensive yet sharp and precise
cons: The limited number of sizes may not suit all dog owners

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I'm a groomer and these are hands down the best nail trimmers out there. I've bought a million different kinds over the years and these are the best, You can shave off just a small section of nail so you don't hit the quick. They don't put a lot of pressure on the nail either. I use them constantly and they last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Quality control needs to "tighten up"
customer_reviews.text: These are sharp, no frills, nail trimmers. I believe that the pair I received slipped past quality control. The guard that prevents cutting to much nail was so loose, it wouldn't stay in place. If you turn the clippers toward vehicle, the guard would just fall to the side making it completely ineffective. I had to stake and peen the rivet to tighten up the guard and, I deducted two stars because I had to. You shouldn't have to fix a brand new product for it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I've had a pair of these for over 20 years
customer_reviews.text: And they are still the best nail clippers I own. Mine didn't have a name on them so I had no idea where to buy them again. Thanks to Amazon I found them again. I still use the pair my Mom ( a veterinarian technician) gave me long ago. They are sharp enough to get the job done...No tearing...but cuts quick and clean which saves the dog stress.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: VERY sharp. smaller than most nail clippers of this style, which i like, but the flat handles make them awkward to use when you're used to fatter, padded handles. you do get used to them though. for this style, they are the best i've owned, and i've owned a lot! i'm a pro groomer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kellim

customer_reviews.title: These are the clippers you want!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference the right tools make! Using these clippers compared to others is like the difference between quality tweezers and cheap tweezers. These clippers are efficient, precise, and easy to use. AND they are only about $2 more than the previous clippers that I bought that were none of those things. These nail clippers are the ones you want, they look simple compared to other brands but they are excellent to use. I was going to start paying the groomer to clip my puppy's nails after struggling with a different brand of clipper, these clippers saved us. So happy I found them.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews mention, the locking mechanism can sometimes swing down and lock the clippers closed while you're using them. It's not a big deal, and eventually you learn how to avoid it. Same goes for the "nail guard", the piece that is supposed to prevent you from clipping too much nail off at a time. It's pretty loose, but I never rely on it anyway. Other than that, my dogs are not nearly as afraid of these clippers as the other ones. They cut very well, and I can blast through all 4 paws in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: hotelmode

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Small Dog
customer_reviews.text: Love these--sharp, easy to hold and manuever, great slide switch to keep them closed. The nail guard stays in place on my pair or moves out of the way if I want to see better. I find that, because it is too far back to really act as a guard for the nails for my small (13lb) terrier, it's easier for me to see the angle of the nail and how much I am cutting if I slide the guard out of place. 10/10 will order again when these get too dull.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stone

customer_reviews.title: Guard plate flips - ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Guard plate is loose. Flips from side to side with the slightest of moves. Renders itself completely useless by doing so. The blade itself is not that impressive either. Not a precision cut. Purchased based on reviews and now wish I hadn't.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.H.

customer_reviews.title: The best clipper!!! Made me a nail-master!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my dog hates nail clipper before. It was a repeating nightware everytime we try to clip his nails. But, after I purchased this clipper, everything changed (slowly though)!! It was very sharp. I can clip his nail like, ka!, and done, very quickly! I bet sometimes when my dog hasn't even noticed that I was clipping his nail, I was already finished one paw. I guess nail clippers will eventually get blunt, and by that time I will purchase this one again. Not those colorful plastic clippers. Those plastic ones hurt my dog and made my think that I can't do this.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Fox

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: My friend who grooms told me these are the best clippers to use on my dogs for at home trims. She was right! They cut so much easier than the other pair I have had, seems to cut cleanly. Only complaint is just like on all the others this type I have had the guide does NOT stay put where you need it to be. It's hard enough to cut the nails without having to keep moving the guide to the center, it's too loose. Is there a way I don't know of to adjust it? Everything else is great though!
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy and tedious. No good.
customer_reviews.text: The tab that locks them closed is loose and keeps moving when I try to clip. And the guard is loose and moves every time I try to clip. Basically you have to hold both pieces in place while holding the clippers trying to get your claw in the clippers and hope one doesn't slip so you have to start over. I guess a dollop of hot glue would keep the guard in place, but why?
customer_reviews.author: Loock

customer_reviews.title: Best tool!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 10 years old and trimming his nails has been a challenge for all of those 10 years until now. They have no trouble going through his thick, fast growing corgi nails and he tolerates it better than going to the groomer.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how happy I am with my purchase! With this virus happening, a lot of grooming responsibilities have transferred to me...and toe nails have been the worst. One of my dogs is terrified and the countless pairs of bad clippers have only made her more fearful. Crushing the nail, jagged cuts so I have to do each nail 3-4 times. Not with these! I will NEVER ever ever use another set. Soooo sharp and one quick cut later, toenail is done! No need to file them either. If only I had found these years ago. Please purchase, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our new puppy
customer_reviews.text: We resued a puppy from a rescue organization and his nails were super long. We didn't want to have to take him to get his nails clipped so we figured we'd buy these and learn how to clip his nails. Wathced a few Youtube videos and were able to do it with no problem. These clipped his nails super easy. Now we get to save money. The quallity is very noticeable and if taken care of these will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Art Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kittens
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 squirmy little kittens at home and these were perfect for trimming their claws. Gentle and very sharp so there is no need to turn the cats paw to get at the claws. Was recommended to me by my vet and after using them I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Gadoury

customer_reviews.title: great clippers
customer_reviews.text: I have been a professional pet groomer for 50 years..These clippers have been my go to clippers for the majority of those years..I like that these don't snap or crush the nail which causes pain. These are too small for really large dogs but I use them for most. The nail stop that is attached tends to get in the way but I just push it aside and it works fine without it.
customer_reviews.author: Stress Break

customer_reviews.title: Get these
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly some of the best dog nail clippers, regardless of the size of your dog. The clip easily through the nail and don’t just smash. These are also the pair of dog clippers that I see most recommended. I’ve used them to trim the nails on a golden retriever s as well as a miniature schnauzer without any issues. Overall I love then and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Slashlilystar

customer_reviews.title: red handle miller forge- the best
customer_reviews.text: these slice the nail , they do not crush like most clippers. you can slice off tiny amounts of nail without hurting the dog. give lots of treats while doing it . i bought 4 pairs, i have one pair with stiptic in every room , i practice giving treats and trim one nail at a time to start.
customer_reviews.author: sallyb

customer_reviews.title: Millers Forge Steel Pet Nail Clipper
customer_reviews.text: Love this nail clipper because it does not make a loud snap when cutting the dog's nails. My dog is medium size and does not like to cut his nails at all. Most clippers I have tried make a loud snapping sound when the nail is clipped that my dog does not like at all. This clipper is also sharp and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: bheiser

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different brands of clippers to compare, and these were by far the best. I can't believe how sharp they are! Trimmed my german shepherd mix's thick black nails with ease - he's usually pretty good about nail trims, but this will make the process go so much smoother. I wish I'd gotten these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Erica V

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The nail guard was not staying in place so my husband did something to make it work for us but other than that, it works very well in taking off just the right amount of nail with the guard in place. Sharp enough that it clips nicely in one cut, now if only we can get our dog to stay still long enough!
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Skinny handles
customer_reviews.text: My first time clipping my dogs nails and these were good. I was expecting the handles to be a little more thicker for a better grip. They are skinny handles.
customer_reviews.author: Sofi

customer_reviews.title: Sharp. Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp. Easy to take slices at a time with very little pressure on the nail. Leaves smooth edges, but I still often use a grinder (helps to have my pups used to both methods anyway). The only complaint I have had is the safety guard likes to slide out of place when I am using it and gets in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: Above the rest of any nail clipper - for big dogs and especially for small dogs. No clicking sound when the nail is cut, so for dogs that are afraid, these are perfect. The great feature is that the blades taper down to very thin, allowing maneuverability and very easy to "shave" only a small portion of the nail. This is great for black dog nails. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Only nails clippers I will use
customer_reviews.text: Been in dogs for over 30 yrs and these are my favorite clippers - I have big dogs and these work well though after a time they do dull. I just get a new pair - the price is right. They do not split the nail and can be used to shape the nail if one is careful.
customer_reviews.author: River Runner13

customer_reviews.title: Love These For our Feisty Puppy
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and sharp which makes it easier to quickly get through my dog’s nails, which is important since she hates having them clipped. The guard is too loose so it flops down on its own making it pretty useless, but I don’t use it anyway since it inhibits my view of the nail. Overall, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: These are sharp and cut my dogs nails like butter
customer_reviews.text: I cut my dog's nails at home (a Wire Fox Terrier). I must have done hours of research before I ended up using a high rated manual clipper and Dremel sander combo. My dog tolerated the Dremel, but when it accidentally tugged on my dog's curly fur one day- he was done. Left to what I thought were sharp clippers it was a battle every time. I ordered these on a whim and man o man they are fast bc they are so sharp with only slight pressure, I catch him when he's sleepy and things are going smoothly this far. Quality and timeless design that reminds me of a classic pocket knife, no bulky neon plastic. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Agatha June

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers I’ve ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I finally found these! Cuts through the nails easily without putting pressure on the nail. I have 4 American bullies up to 75 pounds. These cut their thick nails perfectly. Though are gentle enough they would work great on a small puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Best clipper I ever owned. Looked at reviews on Youtube and It came out #1. Don't let the price or thinness of this fool you. This clipper is incredibly sharp, it cuts through claws like butter with no sound at all. Highly recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Cut nails more easily
customer_reviews.text: So easy to cut even a large dog's nails with these. I usually don't cut straight through the nail, but I think you could with these. I cut little bits off each nail until I get to the right place. My dogs seem pretty accepting of this clipper. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well; safety guide not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and does what it is supposed to! I would comment that the guide for safety is a bit deceiving and I believe it would be safer without - furthermore, this piece swivels our of place inadvertently more than half the time when cutting nails.
customer_reviews.author: Dealseeker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog nail clippers!
customer_reviews.text: The only other clippers that I've used finally started to seem dull, and while I tried to sharpen them, it just never seemed to last longer than a single use. The previous were a standard pair of "comfort grip" stype clippers. These clippers are so, so much sharper, slice through nails effortlessly, and make far less noise. The handles on these are slim and might not be comfortable to use from the human perspective, so keep that in mind. I personally have no existing hand pain, and find these easy to manage. I think my dog appreciates the reduced pressure on her nails.
customer_reviews.author: Vysh

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: legnth plate moves to easy if you dont watch you will cut their nails into the quick
customer_reviews.author: james e mcknight sr

customer_reviews.title: favorite nail clipper
customer_reviews.text: Cuts the nail easily. Wish they would do away with the safety guard.
customer_reviews.author: TinasDogs

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This item was much more flimsy tan the description leads you to believe. The packaging was damaged. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: ZZ35mm/digital

customer_reviews.title: Millers Forge is nice ans sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I was hoping it would be a little sturdier than the last one I bought. It looked bigger and heavier, but was the same size. I hope this one stays smooth and doesn't start catching.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good clippers.
customer_reviews.text: These cut my dogs thick nails very well. The only issue I have with them is the handles are very thin and so not so easy to hold onto. Also, the red grip covering of the handles slides off every time I use them. I'll probably just add a dab of glue inside them but I just don't think I should have to .
customer_reviews.author: pam ludolph

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing nail clippers! I've been having a hard time clipping my dashchunds nails and these things are amazing! They literally cut through the nail like butter. Customer service is amazing too. They emailed me just to make sure I received my package
customer_reviews.author: Brandy K

customer_reviews.title: They cut like a hot knife through butter!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, professional dog groomer here! I've only had these a few days but I LOVE them more than any nail trimmer I've ever used. Very durable an comfortable in my hands. Can be used with right or left hand.
customer_reviews.author: AmberB

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Quite
customer_reviews.text: I love these Clippers. They are sized perfect Sharp And there is ZERO noise. Only things I dont like is the red handlea slide OFF during clipping. I glue mine on. Dropping a few drops of glue inside of them as they slide on.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Strong

customer_reviews.title: This worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well. I had tried a nail clipper years ago and it did not work well so I was apprehensive. I practiced on a twig. It took two of us. One to hold our dog on place. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Your pup will appreciate these, sorry there are no squishy handle pads.
customer_reviews.text: Saw comments about how the handle is not super comfy, bought them anyway. Well, handle smandel! Cuts our beagle-bassets claws like a hot knife through butter. First time she didn't complain, jerk away and try to escape during a clipping session. This dog is kinda sketchy on me anyway, clean quick cutting is the best thing I can do toward relationship building!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't anyone tell me about these before? SOOO much better than anything you buy in the pet section at the stores. The little stopper/guide is useless but you really don't need it. I've never cut my dog's nails so fast!
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: perfect cat nail trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This nail trimmer is perfect for cats and small animals. It is the only one I will use. The last one, same product lasted for years and still was sharp. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: L. Watson-czapla

customer_reviews.title: Buy these NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found these sooner. They work on all size dogs, even though they’re listed as small. I have a mini Australia Shepard, a pit bull mix, and a Golden Retriever, and 2 cats. Everyone gets trims with these bad boys, and I can do everyone’s in about 15 because they cut so smoothly. Get these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Ease to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m new at this and I have a small to medium Yorkshire Terrier with huge nails and quicks. I’m cautious and the dog is scared. But from what I’ve clipped these are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shivy

customer_reviews.title: Best nail trimmers.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dog nail trimmers. They cut like a hot knife through butter. The nail guard is a little too loose but my husband was able to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest nail clippers on the narket
customer_reviews.text: As a professional groomer we love these nail clippers. They seem to stay sharp and cut rather then crush the nail. Not recommended for dogs with nails that curl into the nail bed
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lessuck

customer_reviews.title: sharp and efficient
customer_reviews.text: These clippers allow me to clip my dog's nails quickly and efficiently. I don't use the guard because my dog has white nails, and i can see exactly where i'm cutting. They're sharp, take care of the cut the first time, no nail cracking (have experienced this with other clippers).
customer_reviews.author: Linda A

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: I did some research before purchasing these and this is the first pair of clippers I’ve ever bought, that being said these were surprisingly very smooth and very easy to use, even though I was terrified clipping her nails on my own it turned out quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and easily cuts nails
customer_reviews.text: These are so sharp!! They cut her nails without adding any pressure like my Safari clippers do. She was able to handle her nail clipping so much better. I’m not a fan of the handle though. It’s a lot more slippery to hold than the rubber grip on my Safari Clippers, but the sharpness makes it well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY dog nail clippers. Very sharp and quality surgical steel.
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY dog nail clippers. Very sharp and quality surgical steel. My dogs no longer wince each time I clip a nail because these require almost no pressure to glide through the cuts. VERY impressed.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this trimmer, easy to use, light weight
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this trimmer. Have always had them in the past and lost the current one last week. Have tried others but didn't like them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Raeshke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality clippers!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these! So worth it! I have always hated cutting my dog’s nails and dreaded doing it until I bought these. These clippers made the process so quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mdb90

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers on market!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best clippers IVE EVER HAD! EASY to reach between toes cuz they are smaller and nice and sharp for clean cuts with less doggy anxiety!😊
customer_reviews.author: Annette Ball

customer_reviews.title: Best dog nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these dog nail clippers. They are sharp, easy to use and great for my hands that have a little arthritis. I can take little nips as needed. My dog is no longer afraid to have her nails trimmed. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Meli

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would’ve bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I have an 80lb German Shepherd and these cut her nails so smooth and quick she doesn’t notice. I’ve originally spent 3X this price on other clippers that don’t offer a smooth quick cut. These are sharp and get the job done. I’ve purchased this along with a dremel and it’s completely changed our life and no more groomer trips.
customer_reviews.author: kendra b.

customer_reviews.title: The best for all size dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have six dogs all different sizes and these are by far the best nail clippers I've ever found for all of them. They cut without crushing.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: Work great. I find the "guard" annoying it just gets in the way of use even when pushed to the side it tends to fall back and obstruct cutting. Maybe some people find it useful I do not. Otherwise a simple effective tool.
customer_reviews.author: jms

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Clipper Choice!
customer_reviews.text: These nail clippers work extremely well on our border collie and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JVB

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Sharp. Cuts easily. Will be buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: j L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have Medium and large dogs and these worked great
customer_reviews.author: Jodi G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nail trimmer for all dogd
customer_reviews.text: First nail trimmer that, actually works! Super sharp, clean cut, and our Golden doesn’t mind getting nails trimmed 😃
customer_reviews.author: mary young

customer_reviews.title: very sharp and quiet
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are the best clippers there are! My dog is afraid of getting her nails cut and these are quiet and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Voigt

customer_reviews.title: Easy Grip
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Our daughter has one and influenced this purchase. very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: The blade that is supposed to stop the nail from going in too deep just swivels around. It looks like a tiny nut might be missing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Clippers Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because an online group for clipping dog's nails recommended these even for large dogs over the Millers Forge orange-handled ones. I bought both. I have 60+ lb dogs and these are much better than any other clippers I've tried and they're a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rubi

customer_reviews.title: Clipping Nails made easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use clippers for my dog. Used these on my lab/shepherd mix and perfect size for her nails. Tried using them on my doxie mix but he’ll need smaller ones. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blade makes cutting nails easier. Others crush nail more than cut.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: Millers Forge, the best as usual! Been using this brand for decades! Handles could use more padding.
customer_reviews.author: bookman46

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size and very quiet. Also has guard feature the doesn’t allow you to cut too much at once.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY,  DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Safety stop will not stay in place. To much trouble to take to pack & take to PO to return. So I'm stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great nail clippers. Much easier to use than other clippers I have used. They’re quieter and more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few and personally these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Castrejon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut
customer_reviews.text: This is very sharp and easy to cut, great for small -medium size dog
customer_reviews.author: Juana Liem

customer_reviews.title: They are super sharp
customer_reviews.text: They are really sharp I love them but they are really difficult to use for us left handed people
customer_reviews.author: Alison Mann

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our 1.5lbs Shih Tzus size. She has tiny nails.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: The best dog nail trimmer around.
customer_reviews.text: Item was perfect it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Young

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are much better than others. You can shave tiny pieces of the nail. Very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: KWH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use for you and it goes easy on your furry friend as well. Win/win.
customer_reviews.author: Sil fig

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a product that cuts like butter
customer_reviews.text: Handles are small but it makes it very easy to maneuver. Cuts very well and was one of the cheaper clippers I could find. No splintering, no issues, awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Hand grips slip
customer_reviews.text: The rubber hand grips slide off and the center spring broke this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Raye Bass

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Made it so easy not to hurt my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda sears

customer_reviews.title: very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Love these nail clippers very sharp and easy to use highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Geisser

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Dog groomer here. These are my favorite pair. Been using them for 20 years. Only needed to replace 3 times during that time.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Best dog nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Love the clippers and so does my dog. Easy to use but so gentle on the dog
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Living

customer_reviews.title: Great dog nail trimmer
customer_reviews.text: For small to medium dogs nail trimming. Has a safety lock on it. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Sue Shammo

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: The best nail clippers I’ve tried yet! Very smooth - received item quickly!
customer_reviews.author: West Branch Kennel

customer_reviews.title: But these !!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Super sharp, easy to use and wish I’d found them sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Clipping my puppies nails has been no easy job, but the Miller's Forge are sharp and quick. I just don't care much for the bar that flips down in the way all the time, but other than that these have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Emmert

customer_reviews.title: Cut nails better than any other clippers
customer_reviews.text: These clippers were suggested by a vet. Best clippers since they cut nails like butter. Easy to use and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Clinical Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers ever
customer_reviews.text: I can only suggest those they work wonderful on my Pyrenees-Bordercollie Mix
customer_reviews.author: victoria s.yunker

customer_reviews.title: Best and only clippers I’ll use
customer_reviews.text: The best. Super super sharp, easy to control, small enough for women’s hands. Takes almost no effort to close the blade. It’s smooth and therefore no loud clipping sound like other clippers. Easy to take super small slivers off at a time as to avoid cutting too close to the quick
customer_reviews.author: Marie

product_meta.title: Millers Forge Steel Pet Nail Clipper 743C with Safety Stop Bar Small Medium Dog
product_meta.description: Color:As the picture showProduct Features Durable plier-style nail clipper Comfortable red plastic grips and a spring-loaded cutting mechanism for more positive cutting action Built-in guard can be moved into position to prevent the overcutting of the nails and there is a lock to hold the trimmers closed for storage and maintenance Quality-made of stainless steel to withstand years of use Size: 5" (12,7 cm) long
